General.Name: Jizhong Energy Resources Co Ltd
General.Description: Jizhong Energy Resources Co., Ltd. engages in the coal business in China. It also produces coke, caustic soda, PVC chemical products; building materials; and electric power. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Xingtai, China.
General.Address: No. 191 Zhongxing West Street, Xingtai, China, 054000
